overview: Paperwork can wait! Can you "assist" me? There´s no better way to let off some steam at the end of the day then by getting a good feel for your co-worker´s assets. These boys get hard, give head and get butt-laid. Will he do whatever it takes? Everyone needs a little down time in the boy´s room. These boys need to get down together. Every office has a bully, but don´t get intimidated, get intimate.
title: Office ASSets
